00027  * Lustre administrative quota format.
00028  * from linux/fs/quota_v2.c
00029  */
00030 
00031 #include "osd_internal.h"
00032 #include "osd_quota_fmt.h"
00033 
00034 typedef char *dqbuf_t;
00035 
00036 static const union
00037 {
00038         struct lustre_disk_dqblk_v2 r1;
00039 } emptydquot = { .r1 = { 0 } };
00040 
00041 static inline dqbuf_t getdqbuf(void)
00042 {
00043         dqbuf_t buf = kmalloc(LUSTRE_DQBLKSIZE, GFP_NOFS);
00044         if (!buf)
00045                 CWARN("Not enough memory for quota buffers.\n");
00046         return buf;
00047 }
00048 
00049 static inline void freedqbuf(dqbuf_t buf)
00050 {
00051         kfree(buf);
00052 }
00053 
00057 static ssize_t quota_read_blk(const struct lu_env *env,
00058                               struct osd_object *obj,
00059                               int type, uint blk, dqbuf_t buf)
00060 {
00061         ssize_t ret;
00062         struct super_block *sb = obj->oo_inode->i_sb;
00063 
00064         ENTRY;
00065 
00066         memset(buf, 0, LUSTRE_DQBLKSIZE);
00067         LASSERTF((type == USRQUOTA || type == GRPQUOTA), "type=%d\n", type);
00068 
00069         ret = sb->s_op->quota_read(sb, type, buf, LUSTRE_DQBLKSIZE,
00070                                    blk << LUSTRE_DQBLKSIZE_BITS);
00071 
00072         /* Reading past EOF just returns a block of zeros */
00073         if (ret == -EBADR)
00074                 ret = 0;
00075 
00076         RETURN(ret);
00077 }
00078 
00086 static loff_t find_block_dqentry(const struct lu_env *env,
00087                                  struct osd_object *obj, int type,
00088                                  qid_t dqid, uint blk,
00089                                  struct osd_it_quota *it)
00090 {
00091         dqbuf_t                          buf = getdqbuf();
00092         loff_t                           ret;
00093         int                              i;
00094         struct lustre_disk_dqblk_v2     *ddquot;
00095         int                              dqblk_sz;
00096 
00097         ENTRY;
00098 
00099         ddquot = (struct lustre_disk_dqblk_v2 *)GETENTRIES(buf);
00100         dqblk_sz = sizeof(struct lustre_disk_dqblk_v2);
00101         if (!buf)
00102                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00103         ret = quota_read_blk(env, obj, type, blk, buf);
00104         if (ret < 0) {
00105                 CERROR("Can't read quota tree block %u.\n", blk);
00106                 GOTO(out_buf, ret);
00107         }
00108 
00109         if (dqid) {
00110                 for (i = 0; i < LUSTRE_DQSTRINBLK &&
00111                             le32_to_cpu(ddquot[i].dqb_id) != dqid; i++)
00112                         continue;
00113         } else { /* ID 0 as a bit more complicated searching... */
00114                 for (i = 0; i < LUSTRE_DQSTRINBLK; i++)
00115                         if (!le32_to_cpu(ddquot[i].dqb_id) &&
00116                             memcmp((char *)&emptydquot, (char *)&ddquot[i],
00117                                    dqblk_sz))
00118                                 break;
00119         }
00120         if (i == LUSTRE_DQSTRINBLK) {
00121                 CDEBUG(D_QUOTA, "Quota for id %u not found.\n", dqid);
00122                 ret = 0;
00123                 GOTO(out_buf, ret);
00124         } else {
00125                 ret = (blk << LUSTRE_DQBLKSIZE_BITS) +
00126                       sizeof(struct lustre_disk_dqdbheader) + i * dqblk_sz;
00127 
00128                 if (it) {
00129                         it->oiq_blk[LUSTRE_DQTREEDEPTH] = blk;
00130                         it->oiq_offset = ret;
00131                         it->oiq_id = dqid;
00132                         it->oiq_index[LUSTRE_DQTREEDEPTH] = i;
00133                 } else {
00134                         ret = 0;
00135                 }
00136         }
00137 out_buf:
00138         freedqbuf(buf);
00139         RETURN(ret);
00140 }
00141 
00149 loff_t find_tree_dqentry(const struct lu_env *env,
00150                          struct osd_object *obj, int type,
00151                          qid_t dqid, uint blk, int depth,
00152                          struct osd_it_quota *it)
00153 {
00154         dqbuf_t  buf = getdqbuf();
00155         loff_t   ret;
00156         u32     *ref = (u32 *) buf;
00157 
00158         ENTRY;
00159 
00160         if (!buf)
00161                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00162         ret = quota_read_blk(env, obj, type, blk, buf);
00163         if (ret < 0) {
00164                 CERROR("Can't read quota tree block %u.\n", blk);
00165                 GOTO(out_buf, ret);
00166         }
00167         ret = 0;
00168         blk = le32_to_cpu(ref[GETIDINDEX(dqid, depth)]);
00169         if (!blk)               /* No reference? */
00170                 GOTO(out_buf, ret);
00171 
00172         if (depth < LUSTRE_DQTREEDEPTH - 1)
00173                 ret = find_tree_dqentry(env, obj, type, dqid, blk,
00174                                         depth + 1, it);
00175         else
00176                 ret = find_block_dqentry(env, obj, type, dqid, blk, it);
00177 
00178         if (it && ret > 0) {
00179                 it->oiq_blk[depth + 1] = blk;
00180                 it->oiq_index[depth] = GETIDINDEX(dqid, depth);
00181         }
00182 
00183 out_buf:
00184         freedqbuf(buf);
00185         RETURN(ret);
00186 }
00187 
00196 int walk_block_dqentry(const struct lu_env *env, struct osd_object *obj,
00197                        int type, uint blk, uint index,
00198                        struct osd_it_quota *it)
00199 {
00200         dqbuf_t                          buf;
00201         loff_t                           ret = 0;
00202         struct lustre_disk_dqdbheader   *dqhead;
00203         int                              i, dqblk_sz;
00204         struct lustre_disk_dqblk_v2     *ddquot;
00205         struct osd_quota_leaf           *leaf;
00206         ENTRY;
00207 
00208         /* check if the leaf block has been processed before */
00209         list_for_each_entry(leaf, &it->oiq_list, oql_link) {
00210                 if (leaf->oql_blk == blk)
00211                         RETURN(1);
00212         }
00213 
00214         buf = getdqbuf();
00215         dqhead = (struct lustre_disk_dqdbheader *)buf;
00216         dqblk_sz = sizeof(struct lustre_disk_dqblk_v2);
00217         if (!buf)
00218                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00219         ret = quota_read_blk(env, obj, type, blk, buf);
00220         if (ret < 0) {
00221                 CERROR("Can't read quota tree block %u.\n", blk);
00222                 GOTO(out_buf, ret);
00223         }
00224         ret = 1;
00225 
00226         if (!le16_to_cpu(dqhead->dqdh_entries))
00227                 GOTO(out_buf, ret);
00228 
00229         ddquot = (struct lustre_disk_dqblk_v2 *)GETENTRIES(buf);
00230         LASSERT(index < LUSTRE_DQSTRINBLK);
00231         for (i = index; i < LUSTRE_DQSTRINBLK; i++) {
00232                 /* skip empty entry */
00233                 if (!memcmp((char *)&emptydquot,
00234                             (char *)&ddquot[i], dqblk_sz))
00235                         continue;
00236 
00237                 it->oiq_blk[LUSTRE_DQTREEDEPTH] = blk;
00238                 it->oiq_id = le32_to_cpu(ddquot[i].dqb_id);
00239                 it->oiq_offset = (blk << LUSTRE_DQBLKSIZE_BITS) +
00240                                   sizeof(struct lustre_disk_dqdbheader) +
00241                                   i * dqblk_sz;
00242                 it->oiq_index[LUSTRE_DQTREEDEPTH] = i;
00243                 ret = 0;
00244                 break;
00245         }
00246 
00247 out_buf:
00248         freedqbuf(buf);
00249         RETURN(ret);
00250 }
00251 
00260 int walk_tree_dqentry(const struct lu_env *env, struct osd_object *obj,
00261                       int type, uint blk, int depth, uint index,
00262                       struct osd_it_quota *it)
00263 {
00264         dqbuf_t  buf = getdqbuf();
00265         loff_t   ret;
00266         u32     *ref = (u32 *) buf;
00267 
00268         ENTRY;
00269 
00270         if (!buf)
00271                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00272         ret = quota_read_blk(env, obj, type, blk, buf);
00273         if (ret < 0) {
00274                 CERROR("Can't read quota tree block %u.\n", blk);
00275                 goto out_buf;
00276         }
00277         ret = 1;
00278 
00279         for (; index <= 0xff && ret > 0; index++) {
00280                 blk = le32_to_cpu(ref[index]);
00281                 if (!blk)       /* No reference */
00282                         continue;
00283 
00284                 if (depth < LUSTRE_DQTREEDEPTH - 1)
00285                         ret = walk_tree_dqentry(env, obj, type, blk,
00286                                                 depth + 1, 0, it);
00287                 else
00288                         ret = walk_block_dqentry(env, obj, type, blk, 0, it);
00289         }
00290 
00291         if (ret == 0) { /* Entry found */
00292                 it->oiq_blk[depth + 1] = blk;
00293                 it->oiq_index[depth] = index;
00294         }
00295 
00296 out_buf:
00297         freedqbuf(buf);
00298         RETURN(ret);
00299 }
